column1: '''''Tolkien Portraiture''''' is the result of project to identify recurring publication of photographs and sketches that appear in newspaper articles and on the jackets of books about [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]. The publication was compiled by [[Richard E. Blackwelder]], assisted by [[John Rateliff]], [[Christina Scull]], and [[Charles E. Noad]].<ref>[http://libus.csd.mu.edu/search/a?searchtype=t&searcharg=Tolkien+Portraiture&SORT=R&searchscope=1&submit.x=31&submit.y=11&submit=Submit MARQCAT] ([[Marquette University]] Libraries Online Catalog; external link)</ref>
